original_text: As they weep, they will sing this funeral song about you: ‘Tyre was the greatest city. But now it lies at the bottom of the sea and nobody knows that it is there.’ As they weep, they will sing this funeral song about you: ‘Tyre was the greatest city. But now it lies at the bottom of the sea and nobody knows that it is there.’ As they weep, they will sing this funeral song about you:
korean_text: 그들이 통곡할 때에 너를 위하여 슬픈 노래를 불러 애도하여 말하기를 두로와 같이 바다 가운데에서 적막한 자 누구인고

sentences.original_text: they will sing this funeral song about you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신에 대한 이 장례 노래를 부를 것입니다

sentences.original_text: But now it lies at the bottom of the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이제 그것은 바다 밑바닥에 있습니다

sentences.original_text: and nobody knows that it is there
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아무도 그것이 그곳에 있는지 모릅니다
